bondr 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Reference

Networks

Network derived properties

propensities()

Generates the propensity functions to use for the reaction network.

updates()

Generates the update functions to use for the reaction network.

stoichiometric_matrix()

Generates the stoichiometric matrix for a reaction network

deriv_function()

Generates a derivative function compatible with solvers in the deSolve package

Parsing

Network and network component parsing

parse_network()

Parses a string containing a representation of a chemical network

parse_reaction()

Parses a string containing a representation of a unidirectional or bidirectional chemical reaction

parse_species()

Constructs a species object from a string containing a representation of a chemical species

Compiling

compile_network()

Compiles a reaction network to a C++ object.

Network strings

Example networks

gbk_string

Golbeter-Koshland Switch network string

mm_string

Michaelis Menten network string

pc_string

PotassiumChannel network string

schlogl_string

Schlogl network string

S3 methods

species()

species
